evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief Introduction
evidence.text: Plaintiffs seek an injunction and declaratory relief to halt pre‑construction activities, construction, and related operations at the TNT Site unless and until Defendants comply with NEPA and related state, federal and local environmental laws and regulations. Simultaneous with the filing of this Complaint, Plaint

extracted.value: Plaintiff: injunction and declaratory relief to halt pre‑construction activities, construction, and related operations at the TNT Site unless and until Defendants comply with NEPA and related state, federal and local environmental laws and regulations.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief Introduction
evidence.text: Plaintiffs are entitled to injunctive and declaratory relief requiring compliance with NEPA before any further activity occurs at the TNT Site.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: injunctive and declaratory relief requiring compliance with NEPA before any further activity occurs at the TNT Site.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief Introduction
evidence.text: Plaintiffs are entitled to a declaration that the agency’s conduct is unlawful, directing vacatur of the agency action, as well as an injunction preventing further activity until NEPA compliance is achieved.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: declaration that the agency’s conduct is unlawful, directing vacatur of the agency action, as well as an injunction preventing further activity until NEPA compliance is achieved.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief Introduction
evidence.text: Plaintiffs are entitled to a declaration that the Division’s arrangement with DHS is ultra vires and void, and the construction of the TNT Site detention center is being conducted in derogation of state law.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: declaration that the Division’s arrangement with DHS is ultra vires and void, and the construction of the TNT Site detention center is being conducted in derogation of state law.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief Introduction
evidence.text: Plaintiffs are further entitled to injunctive relief preventing further construction or operation at the site.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: injunctive relief preventing further construction or operation at the site.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief Introduction
evidence.text: Plaintiffs are entitled to a declaration under 28 U.S.C. § 2201 that the County may not authorize or allow use of the TNT Site for purposes other than that allowed under the County Code and existing permits and authorizations.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: declaration under 28 U.S.C. § 2201 that the County may not authorize or allow use of the TNT Site for purposes other than that allowed under the County Code and existing permits and authorizations.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief Introduction
evidence.text: Plaintiffs are entitled to award attorneys’ fees and costs as allowed by law.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: award attorneys’ fees and costs as allowed by law.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief Introduction
evidence.text: Plaintiffs are entitled to grant such other relief as the Court deems just and proper.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: grant such other relief as the Court deems just and proper.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief Introduction
evidence.text: Declare that Defendants’ actions violate NEPA and the APA;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: declaration that Defendants’ actions violate NEPA and the APA.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief Introduction
evidence.text: Enjoin any further pre‑construction activities, construction, conversion, or use of the TNT Site for purposes of immigration detention unless and until Defendants comply with NEPA and the APA;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: enjoin any further pre‑construction activities, construction, conversion, or use of the TNT Site for purposes of immigration detention unless and until Defendants comply with NEPA and the APA.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief Introduction
evidence.text: Declare that Defendant Guthrie’s actions exceed lawful authority under Florida law;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: declaration that Defendant Guthrie’s actions exceed lawful authority under Florida law.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief Introduction
evidence.text: Enjoin Defendant Guthrie from authorizing or permitting further development or use of the TNT Site for purposes related to a mass detention center;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: enjoin Defendant Guthrie from authorizing or permitting further development or use of the TNT Site for purposes related to a mass detention center.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief Introduction
evidence.text: Enjoin the County from permitting the use of property limited to aviation activities as a mass detainment center.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: enjoin the County from permitting the use of property limited to aviation activities as a mass detainment center.

evidence.text: Defendants also requested that the court stay any preliminary injunction pending appeal.
